reason: Question is meaningful. Source text matches page 310 definitions of 지각/조퇴/외출 exactly. Answer accurately reflects source. Mention of 승인권자 승인 is from page 311 (5) which is correct handbook content.
Duplicate question of q_4_1042 in same batch. Both ask about 지각/조퇴/외출 차이 with near-identical wording ('차이가 무엇인가요' vs '차이가 뭔가요'). Source text is valid but redundant entry.

Question is meaningful and specific. Source text matches page 310 재직기간별 연가일수 table exactly. Answer accurately lists all 6 tiers (11/15/16/17/20/21일). Additional details about 연가가산 and 이월불가 are verified on page 310 (2)(3).
Duplicate question of q_4_1046 in same batch. Both ask about 재직기간별 연가일수 with near-identical intent. Same source, same core answer content.
Duplicate question of q_4_1046 and q_4_1047 in same batch. Third entry asking 재직기간별 연가일수. Same page 310 source, same answer content.
Duplicate of q_4_1042 (지각/조퇴/외출 정의). Also contains hallucinated commentary ('지각·조퇴·외출은 근무기강과 관련되므로 최소화해야 합니다' not in source) and typo in table ('이름' should be '이른' for 조퇴 퇴근시간).

Duplicate of q_4_1042/q_4_1049 (지각/조퇴/외출 정의). Source citation incomplete (only cites 지각 definition, omits 조퇴/외출). Answer contains extensive content about 근무상황부 관리 and 결근 처리 not found on page 310 - likely hallucinated or from uncited pages.
Duplicate of q_4_1046/q_4_1047/q_4_1048. Fourth entry asking about 재직기간별 연가일수 in same batch. Same source page 310.

Distinct question about 연가가산 specifically. Source text matches page 310 (2) exactly. Answer accurately states conditions (결근/휴직/정직/강등/직위해제 없음, 병가 1일 미만, 연가 3일 미만) and result (각 1일, 합계 2일). No hallucination.
Distinct question about 육아휴직 재직기간 산입. Source text matches page 310 나)(1) exactly. Answer correctly identifies 육아휴직, 법령의무수행, 공무상질병/부상 휴직 are included. No hallucination.
